Detailed Description

A cylinder shape.

Samples random points within a cylinder or on the cylinder surfcace. Specified in the input file via 

:start shape:
    type = cylinder
    radius = the cylinder radius
    height = the cylinder height
    midpoint = Ox, Oy, Oz (optional)
    axis = ax, ay, az (optional)
:stop shape:

If the optional midpoint and axis inputs are missing, the cylinder is centered about the origin and has its axis along the z-axis.
